flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this project, you will learn how to easily make a Sun oven of your own.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project, you will learn how to easily make a Sun oven of your own.

Tools
  • Glue or Tape
guide.summary: Heat up your food in this Sun powered oven.
guide.title: Sun Oven
